summary.para: Indicates the level of support that the adapter provides for render passes, ray tracing, and shader-resource view tier 3 tiled resources.

remarks.para: Pass to to retrieve a D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_D3D12_OPTIONS5 structure.

summary.para: A boolean value indicating whether the options require shader-resource view tier 3 tiled resource support. For more information, see .
The extent to which a device driver and/or the hardware efficiently supports render passes. See .
Specifies the level of ray tracing support on the graphics device. See .
Specifies the level of ray tracing support on the graphics device. See .
